resources.string: This 2WD Smart Soccer Robot Chassis Kit is easy to assemble and use robot chassis platform. It provides you with everything you need to give your Soccer Robot a fast two wheel drive platform with plenty of room for expansion to add various sensors and controllers (such as Arduino). All you need to do is supply a basic motor driver and power and you’ll be ready to drive. This 2WD Smart Soccer Robot Chassis Kit is easy to assemble and use robot chassis platform. It provides you with everything you need to give your Soccer Robot a fast two wheel drive platform with plenty of room for expansion to add various sensors and controllers (such as Arduino). All you need to do is supply a basic motor driver and power and you’ll be ready to drive
